title: Introduction to French Patisserie
description: Master the art of French pastry with this comprehensive collection of techniques and recipes.

sections.sectionDescription: Learn fundamental techniques that form the foundation of French pastry making.

comments.text: This inspired me to finally try making croissants!

chapters.title: Understanding Butter in Pastry
chapters.content: The quality and temperature of butter are crucial factors in creating perfect French pastry. This chapter explores how butter affects texture, lamination, and flavor...

chapters.content:

2. What is the difference between pâte sucrée and pâte sablée?
3. Name three classic French pastry shapes and their traditional fillings.
